On this page you will find interactive learning tools of missing data methods

# Simple Imputation methods
This tool shows the effect of applying single imputation methods in the case of one outcome variable
and one covariate with missing data. [Go to the tool](https://mwheymans.shinyapps.io/simpleimp/){target="_blank"}
